alert.note: Alert for Denton (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued September 21 at 6:22PM CDT until September 21 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL DENTON COUNTY... At 622 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Krum, or near Denton, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Denton, Lewisville, Flower Mound, Corinth, Highland Village, Lake Dallas, Krum, Argyle, Hickory Creek, Shady Shores, Aubrey, Krugerville, Cross Roads, Copper Canyon, Oak Point, Lakewood Village, Lincoln Park, Lewisville Lake, and Providence Village. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
